document.discussion_title: Orient Paper Inc. (ONP) Posts Quarterly Earnings Results - WKRB News
document.topic_text: Tweet Orient Paper Inc. (NYSEMKT:ONP) issued its quarterly earnings results on Wednesday. The company reported $0.12 EPS for the quarter. The company earned $38 million during the quarter, compared to analysts’ expectations of $41.30 million. During the same period in the previous year, the firm posted $0.28 EPS. Shares of Orient Paper ( NYSEMKT:ONP ) opened at 1.08 on Friday. Orient Paper has a 52 week low of $1.00 and a 52 week high of $2.17. The firm has a market cap of $23.17 million and a PE ratio of 2.76. The firm’s 50-day moving average is $1.10 and its 200 day moving average is $1.17. Orient Paper, Inc is a holding company for the Hebei Baoding Orient Paper Milling Company Limited (Orient Paper HB), a producer and distributor of paper products in China. The Company is engaged in production and distribution of four categories of paper products: corrugating medium paper (CMP), offset printing paper, digital photo paper and tissue paper products. This story was originally published by WKRB News (http://www.wkrb13.com) and is the sole property of WKRB News. If you are reading this article on another website, that means this article was illegally copied and re-published to this website in violation of U.S. and International copyright law.
